Name: Cucina Casalinga
Review Text: Great food. Really enjoyed the tasting menu. slight mix up with there being no lamb left, but as we were able to be fit in at short notice that's a minor issue resolved quickly. â€¦

Name: Cucina Casalinga
Review Text: Amazing experience. The food was delicious and the service was very friendly. It felt like a true Italian dinner. They also provided good recommendation for the wine as per our taste. Highly recommended.

Name: Cucina Casalinga
Review Text: Exquisite food and experience. We went here expecting a cozy living room type of restaurant and we were absolutely right. Very friendly host and staff and a nice atmosphere. â€¦

Name: Cucina Casalinga
Review Text: Wow what a great time I had when I went to this ristorante. Carlo and Giovanni made us all feel home and went the extra mile with courtesy wine and dessert. I loved it and will go.back whenever I have the chance. Thanks!!!

Name: Cucina Casalinga
Review Text: great restaurant, great people. went in for dinner with colleagues, I could not have the dessert due to food allergies and, without asking, they made me a safe and delicious alternative. they care about their customers

Name: Cucina Casalinga
Review Text: Risotto tartufo e luccio sicuramente da provare.Main course of meat superb.Very friendly atmosphere and the food was delicious.presentation looked nice as well. Definitely highly recommend.

Name: Cucina Casalinga
Review Text: Again, I was pleasantly surprised by the fine cuisine. Cucina Casalinga has evolved into a great dining experience. The witty patron Don shows his personal interest in each guest with nice wine suggestions. It's a fine little Italian â€¦

Name: Cucina Casalinga
Review Text: Very good , tasty and quality food!!! Heartwarming place with friendly owner and nice ambiance!

Name: Cucina Casalinga
Review Text: Cucina Casalinga is a remarkable Italian restaurant in the Olympic Stadion neighberhood. It is everything and more you could expect from your local Italian. It is intimate and comfortable yet it has none of the nonsense many Amsterdam based â€¦

Name: Cucina Casalinga
Review Text: Lovely restaurant, really nice service, good wine advise, simply good cooking without any unneccesary gimmicks. Would very much recommend this place if you're up for good meal as you would eat it in Italy, with an interesting choice of (mostly affordable) wines and zero instagrammable bs (so also not the public that comes with it).

Name: Cucina Casalinga
Review Text: Wow, the carpaccio di manzo is delicious and the tagliolini al tartufo is to die for! There was a mishap with the desert but they were wonderful in sorting it out with a new desert and a bottle of wine to make up for the mishap. Definitely recommend eating here!

Name: Cucina Casalinga
Review Text: Charming Mediterranean atmosphere & location. Perfect variety & portions served by knowledgeable personnel. A must for whoever is looking to spend their time in good company and enjoy Italyâ€™s finest cuisine at its best. Definitely a place to go back to!

Name: Cucina Casalinga
Review Text: The restaurant itself is pretty nice and cute, tough it's a bit small. The food is ok, and it's a bit expensive for the what it was. Also, we realized afterwards that we had yo pay for olive oil (even though it was already on the table when â€¦

Name: Cucina Casalinga
Review Text: very nice service, delicious and original dishes. Highly recommend

Name: Cucina Casalinga
Review Text: Fantastic authentic Italian eats with friendly service. One of my favorite spots in town that I would highly recommend to all foodies who are on the hunt for delicious cuisine.

Name: Cucina Casalinga
Review Text: Wow! Awesome pasta and lasagna! Possibly one of the best Italian food restaurant in town!
